desc: The Happy Bean is a Active Duty Military member owned organization and is more than a cup of coffee. We believe in connecting with one another and bringing a little taste of happiness to the world. With every purchase 15% of the profits will go to NAMI and help those with Mental Health problems.

layout.text: We Are The Happy Bean Project
The Happy Bean Project is more than a cup of coffee. We believe in connecting with one another and bringing a little taste of happiness to the world.
